title: Episode #5: The Cultral History of Facial Hair with Allan Peterkin
description: Welcome back to another episode of the Art of Manliness podcast. In this edition, we talk the history of beards with Allan Peterkin, author of 1000 Beards: The Cultural History of Facial Hair. Find out why popes are beardless, what psychologists have said your beard unconsciously says about you, and why politicians don't have beards anymore.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
